rule_formulation: The input only contains dates before the year 2000.

0.input: The election took place on November 3, 1996
0.label: True

1.input: My parents got married on July 15, 1985
1.label: True

2.input: The historic event occurred on February 28, 1999
2.label: True

3.input: The new year's party will be on January 1, 2001
3.label: False

5.input: The concert was scheduled for March 10, 2012
5.label: False
